Topic.Title: Hey Yahoo. Do You Still Think It Wise To Host Sick Psycho Troll Johns_Joint Publicly Here?

Message.Msg: You surely are funny. -Enjoy your day

Message.Title: Angel, give it arrest [sic].
Message.Msg: Please. -Enjoy the rest of your day

Message.Title: So Wonderful How Many Want To Be Me While They Fixate On All Things Me.
Message.Msg: It's astounding how much of this board is about me and all aspects of me and how one lost soul really really wants to be me. Such intense flattery can never go to my head though because I'm a fully tenured Professor and quite popular in real life. Online life never matters. I hope that helps.
